short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch Disney+ Hotstar in sync with friends

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your online streaming experience into a shared event with our Chrome extension, Disney Hotstar Party. Watch your favorite Disney plus Hotstar content together with friends and family, chat in real-time, and even video chat while enjoying your beloved shows and movies. Our user-friendly extension is free to use and guarantees a secure, synchronized, and immersive viewing experience, making it effortless to connect with loved ones over your preferred Hotstar content.
